function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited coverage of commercial COVID-19 EHR data in regions outside North America","Impact":"Reduced ability to track and analyze COVID-19 cases globally","Mitigation":"Expand data collection and sharing efforts to include regions beyond North America","Technologies":"Global data sharing platforms, standardized data collection and reporting systems","People":"Global health organizations, public health agencies, data collection and analysis professionals","Owner":"Global health organizations, public health agencies, data collection and analysis professionals"},{"Description":"Challenges in using data for research due to differing health record systems and local processes","Impact":"Inability to effectively utilize data for pandemic research and analysis","Mitigation":"Standardize data formats and reporting processes across organizations and jurisdictions","Technologies":"Health data interoperability technologies, data standardization tools","People":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions, public health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Incomplete data capture due to rapid introduction of new coding and system burden","Impact":"Underrepresentation of COVID-19 cases, especially among marginalized populations","Mitigation":"Provide support for effective implementation of new coding and data capture processes, focus on marginalized populations","Technologies":"Data management systems, training and capacity building programs, community outreach and engagement tools","People":"Healthcare systems, public health agencies, marginalized populations","Owner":"Healthcare systems, public health agencies, data management professionals"}]}
